channel.title: Twitter / kerryb
channel.description: Twitter updates from Kerry Buckley / kerryb.

item.title: kerryb: Just bought a Skype headset. Should be good news to anyone who's had to put up with me echoing on conference calls.
item.description: kerryb: Just bought a Skype headset. Should be good news to anyone who's had to put up with me echoing on conference calls.

item.title: kerryb: Downloading VMWare Fusion 2.0.
item.description: kerryb: Downloading VMWare Fusion 2.0.

item.title: kerryb: Reliable-msg stack traces just generated a 17GB log file in about an hour. Who said Ruby was slow?
item.description: kerryb: Reliable-msg stack traces just generated a 17GB log file in about an hour. Who said Ruby was slow?

item.title: kerryb: Wondering which of @robb1e or @DrPep will be the first to blink and buy an iPhone.
item.description: kerryb: Wondering which of @robb1e or @DrPep will be the first to blink and buy an iPhone.

item.title: kerryb: @markng I think a lot of people use WriteRoom (http://is.gd/1Kx) to avoid distraction.
item.description: kerryb: @markng I think a lot of people use WriteRoom (http://is.gd/1Kx) to avoid distraction.

item.title: kerryb: @labete For XP I'd suggest reading XP Explained, 2nd ed (). Don't really like Scrum, and don't know anything about FDD.http://is.gd/2EOY
item.description: kerryb: @labete For XP I'd suggest reading XP Explained, 2nd ed (). Don't really like Scrum, and don't know anything about FDD.http://is.gd/2EOY

item.title: kerryb: Viciously deleting files and applications from my rarely-used work laptop, to try and stop the WebTop migration assistant's 'overflow error'
item.description: kerryb: Viciously deleting files and applications from my rarely-used work laptop, to try and stop the WebTop migration assistant's 'overflow error'

item.title: kerryb: @alaninbelfast I only get a few spam e-mails a year that slip through GMail's filter. Don't know how many false positives there are though.
item.description: kerryb: @alaninbelfast I only get a few spam e-mails a year that slip through GMail's filter. Don't know how many false positives there are though.

item.title: kerryb: Wishing @Casablanca well wherever he's heading after Osmosoft.
item.description: kerryb: Wishing @Casablanca well wherever he's heading after Osmosoft.

item.title: kerryb: Getting spam offering Rails jobs in London. Probably the same agent who managed to get my mobile number.
item.description: kerryb: Getting spam offering Rails jobs in London. Probably the same agent who managed to get my mobile number.

item.title: kerryb: Just made an error in a rakefile, making it rm _rf half the project. Including the .git directory. I *think* I pushed everything recently...
item.description: kerryb: Just made an error in a rakefile, making it rm _rf half the project. Including the .git directory. I *think* I pushed everything recently...

item.title: kerryb: Other people's code, like the past, is a foreign country. Amazed at how differently even two RESTful Rails apps can be implemented.
item.description: kerryb: Other people's code, like the past, is a foreign country. Amazed at how differently even two RESTful Rails apps can be implemented.

item.title: kerryb: @robb1e When I say '3G modem', it's actually a bit more hacky than that, but it works. http://is.gd/1cHW
item.description: kerryb: @robb1e When I say '3G modem', it's actually a bit more hacky than that, but it works. http://is.gd/1cHW

item.title: kerryb: @robb1e You can use an iPhone as a 3G modem if you either jailbreak it or managed to buy NetShare before it was pulled from the app store.
item.description: kerryb: @robb1e You can use an iPhone as a 3G modem if you either jailbreak it or managed to buy NetShare before it was pulled from the app store.

item.title: kerryb: Crisps. Chocolate. Coke. Makes my normal Friday lunch of burger, chips and a pint look positively healthy.
item.description: kerryb: Crisps. Chocolate. Coke. Makes my normal Friday lunch of burger, chips and a pint look positively healthy.

item.title: kerryb: @sandyblair We need a way for BT people to easily find each other's blog, à la http://is.gd/2wGx. One day I'll get round to creating one.
item.description: kerryb: @sandyblair We need a way for BT people to easily find each other's blog, à la http://is.gd/2wGx. One day I'll get round to creating one.

item.title: kerryb: Thinking that @philhawksworth is actually committed to the number of 10-and-a-bit beasts. http://is.gd/2tNJ
item.description: kerryb: Thinking that @philhawksworth is actually committed to the number of 10-and-a-bit beasts. http://is.gd/2tNJ

item.title: kerryb: How many people work at BT? About half of them. What do they do? Half of them try to get stuff done, and the other half try to stop them.
item.description: kerryb: How many people work at BT? About half of them. What do they do? Half of them try to get stuff done, and the other half try to stop them.

item.title: kerryb: @sandyblair Bizarre -- someone was just telling me five minutes ago that I ought to learn Haskell. There's a Ruby git too: http://is.gd/2rRi
item.description: kerryb: @sandyblair Bizarre -- someone was just telling me five minutes ago that I ought to learn Haskell. There's a Ruby git too: http://is.gd/2rRi

item.title: kerryb: iPhone restore failed (corrupt backup). Now up and running again, but with no music, photos, e-mail or app data yet. I blame the LHC.
item.description: kerryb: iPhone restore failed (corrupt backup). Now up and running again, but with no music, photos, e-mail or app data yet. I blame the LHC.
